content:
COPY
April 16, 1962
NC-3329
Supply Office Naval Support Activity Taipei, Taiwan
Gentlemen,
Enclosed herewith are seven (7) Purchase Order Nos. E62-NC-046 thru E62-NC-052 for the procurement of 109 jeeps and other vehicles.
8
Upon notification that the vehicles are available for transfer we will arrange for the recipients to take delivery.
Sincerely yours, 許躍爾 140.112.213.82
H. T. Potter Supply Advisor
Encl. As stated
8
Cho/ml 4/16/62
cc : P/SP-311 X/C&R (2) PH ED ID JCRR JGWhite CUSA 2nd Div. CUSA 3rd Div.
國史馆 Academia Historica
255

E62-NC-046 thru E62-NC-052 for the procurement of 109 jeeps
Upon notification that the vehicles are available for
transfer we will arrange for the recipients to take delivery.

paragraphs.content: Supply Office Naval Support Activity Taipei, Taiwan
Enclosed herewith are seven (7) Purchase Order Nos. E62-NC-046 thru E62-NC-052 for the procurement of 109 jeeps and other vehicles.
Upon notification that the vehicles are available for transfer we will arrange for the recipients to take delivery.
